ygData.subject: Re: Pet Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Finally made it to level 8(half bubble up, half bubble down for 4 hours) and started looking for Mircyl s Animation Pet spell. Is it True you can only
ygData.messageBody:
<excerpt>Finally made it to level 8(half bubble up, half bubble down for
4 hours)

and started looking for Mircyl's Animation Pet spell.


Is it True you can only get this spell at High Hold Pass?


</excerpt><<<<<<<<


this is true. all the pet spells for enchanters from level 8 and above
are at highkeep in highhold pass. they have a bank there, too, so i
suggest you put all your belongings in the bank and go the whole way
invis. also, i suggest you but not only the lvl 8, but the lvl 12 and 16
as well (put them in the bank, they should be there after you log out and
back on)


>>>>

<excerpt>

How is the trip? and where the hell is it?



</excerpt><<<<<<<<


where are you coming from? i went from qeynos with a large group of lvl
11-12 people. it was hard only because of the karannas (east karanna the
hardest, got killed by lions and griffons). heed the above advice- put
all your stuff in the bank and just take it out when you get to highkeep.
run the whole way, dont stop to fight anything. i was lvl 12 when i made
the trip, so i bound myself to every zone i made it to.


>>>>

<excerpt>

</excerpt>Qorona of the Volition Guild, 16th lvl enchanter on
Cazic-Thule

-------------------

tim borrelli

computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire

Volition, Inc.

timmyland@...
